title: The Storm riders = Fung Wan: Hungba Tinha
creator_credit: Andrew Lau, Manfred Wong, Li Zhu An, Centro Digital and Golden Harvest
brief_description: A martial arts fantasy film adapted from the long-running manga comic. The Lord Conqueror orphans two children, Wind and Cloud, then brings them up as his disciples. Ten years later the two are set against each other as they rival for the affections of Charity, the Lord Conqueror’s daughter. In Cantonese with English subtitles. Cast includes: Aaron Kwok, Ekin Cheng, Sonny Chiba, Kristy Yang and Shu Oi.
